mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.name AS "name", a.sort AS "sort", a.version AS "version", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", o2.name AS "office.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o2 ON o2.id = a.office_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pro_tape_type( id, office_id, name, sort, version, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{office.id}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{version}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
